sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些协词的共同含义是"减少，变少"。
means: decrease ： 指逐渐地、不断地减少。
diminish ： 侧重大小数量和重要性的不断减小，强调减小的部分。
lessen ： 普通用词，与decrease近义。指数目、程度、价值、实力等的减少。
reduce ： 普通用词，含义广。指数量、程度的降低或减少。
dwindle ： 与decrease同义，指逐渐减小，但强调变得越来越少终至全无。

sentence.Network_en: Toolbelts free both hands and lessen the risk of dropping hammers.
sentence.Network_cn: 工具腰带解放了双手，还减少了锤子掉落的风险。

sentence.Network_en: Several drugs are used to lessen the severity of the symptoms.
sentence.Network_cn: 使用了几种药来减轻症状。

specialist Kalichi of agriculture ministry says , increasing of food taking for a rabbit , could help to enhance its immunity , make it healthier and lessen illness attack , then speed the growth .农业部专家凯利奇表示，兔子进食增加，有助于提升它的免疫功能，增进健康，减少疾病侵袭，进而促进兔子的生长。

the conductivity is proportional to volume of steel-fiber to some extent . this behavior will be helpful to decrease temperature gradient and lessen surface thermal stress of concrete structure .根据热传导理论，给出了钢纤维掺量与混凝土导温系数的关系，得出钢纤维混凝土有较好的导热性，该特性对水工混凝土结构防止表面裂
v. 减轻，减少lessen tensions 缓和紧张局势[同]diminish

entry.def: If something lessens or you lessen it, it becomes smaller in size, amount, degree, or importance.

example.ex: He is used to a lot of attention from his wife, which will inevitably lessen when the baby is born...
example.tran: 他习惯了妻子对他的百般关注，但孩子出生后这种关注就会不可避免地减少。

example.ex: Make sure that your immunisations are up to date to lessen the risk of serious illness.
example.tran: 要确保接种最新的疫苗，以降低患上严重疾病的危险。

means.word_mean: 1. decrease in size, extent, or range;

sentences.sentence: "The amount of homework decreased towards the end of the semester"
"her weight fall to under a hundred pounds"

auth_sentence.content: Nor does it lessen the inevitability of their slaughter.
auth_sentence.res_content: Nor does it lessen the inevitability of their slaughter.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Nor does it lessen the inevitability of their slaughter.

auth_sentence.content: A good shoe will lessen the risk of injury.
auth_sentence.res_content: A good shoe will lessen the risk of injury.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: A good shoe will lessen the risk of injury.

auth_sentence.content: Will Flu deaths lessen if the planet warms?
auth_sentence.res_content: Will Flu deaths lessen if the planet warms?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Will Flu deaths lessen if the planet warms?

Sentence.sentence: As a result, violations of the law and abuses of the intent of the law have lessened the financial rewards of authors, artists and producers.

sentences.en: Eating a good diet significantly lessens the risk of heart disease.
sentences.cn: 良好的饮食习惯能大大减少患心脏病的机率。

sentences.en: Listening to the speech through an interpreter lessened its impact somewhat.
sentences.cn: 演讲辞通过翻译的嘴说出来， 多少削弱了演讲的力量。

sentences.en: Regular exercise can help to lessen the pain.
sentences.cn: 经常运动有助于减轻痛感。
